properties.displayName: Audit Windows VMs that do not have the specified applications installed
properties.description: This initiative deploys the policy requirements and audits Windows virtual machines that do not have the specified applications installed. For more information on Guest Configuration policies, please visit https://aka.ms/gcpol

metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of the names of the applications that should be installed. e.g. 'Microsoft SQL Server 2014 (64-bit); Microsoft Visual Studio Code' or 'Microsoft SQL Server 2014*' (to match any application starting with 'Microsoft SQL Server 2014')
